txt.en: 'Ah, we all return and the survey was a great success!'
Complete the quest \qSundergrót: Biting Insects\q
Sundergrót can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should talk to Náth outside of Sundergrót.
Scout Egvárth

'Ah yes, Sundergrót. I have been studying the northern dwarf-holds during my time in Erebor. Sundergrót is an old structure, but it should be well-preserved; know you not how impressive is dwarf-craft? I agree with Agátur that it would be worth a survey. I know many have their eyes on Gundabad, and I do not blame them for that! But there are other Dwarf-holds still worth surveying, and not just the Mountain-home! Come, let us depart.'

'The old Dwarf-hold of Sundergrót! It is nearby to the west, is it not? Let us explore the ruins. Perhaps we can find something useful there! I am sure the Beornings of Limlók will be pleased with us leaving their village for a while! Náth, what do you say?'
Defeat foes at Egvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy weapons at Egvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Cross the Skerabrygg in the Floodfells
Continue to Sundergrót
Complete the quest \qSundergrót: The Intruders\q
DNT more baddies
Complete the quest \qSundergrót: Goblin Supplies\q
Complete the quest \qSundergrót: Evaluating the Hold\q
Complete the quest \qSundergrót: Mining Sappers\q
Náth cam be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should talk to Náth.
With Rúzat, Agátur, and Náth waiting for word from Grimbeorn, they set their restless minds to the old Dwarf-ruins of Sundergrót.
Defeated foes at Stramvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroyed supplies at Stramvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Rúzat outside of Sundergrót
Talk to Rúzat outside of Sundergrót
Skerabrygg can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should cross the Skerabrygg.
Sundergrót can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should survey Sundergrót's interior.
Talk to Náth outside of Sundergrót
There are a number of goblins here. Too many!
'The old Dwarf-hold of Sundergrót!'
Defeated foes at Egvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sundergrót can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should travel to Sundergrót.
'Ah yes, Sundergrót. I have been studying the northern Dwarf-holds during my time in Erebor.'
'Bah, this place is crawling with Goblins!'
Destroyed weapons at Egvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I thank you for clearing the old watch posts, my friend!'
'Watch out for the goblins.'
Scout Stramvárth
Defeat foes at Stramvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sundergrót can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should talk to Rúzat outside of Sundergrót.
Destroy supplies at Stramvárth ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'Ah, we all return and the survey was a great success! I believe we have found Sundergrót to remain a useful dwarf-hold! We must bring this knowledge back to Skarháld with us!'

'Náth wishes to have Sundergrót surveyed for minerals to see if the depths are rich enough to return to for mining. Make this your primary concern, but watch out for goblins. There are plenty lurking about! Anything you could do to thwart them would be much appreciated, my friend!'
Egvárth can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should scout Egvárth.

'Bah, this place is crawling with goblins! Did you see the old ruins on our way from Skerabrygg to Sundergrót? Aye, Stramvárth and Egvárth, those old watch-posts are called. I would recommend we scout them ourselves and take care of any goblins lurking about the old ruins. You can not be too careful!'
Egvárth can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should clear Egvárth of foes.
Talk to Náth in Limlók
Stramvárth can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should scout Stramvárth.
Stramvárth can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should clear Stramvárth of foes.
Still more foes await you!
Old Sundergrót
Sundergrót can be found in the Floodfells.\n\nYou should talk to Rúzat outside of Sundergrót.

'I thank you for clearing the old watch-posts, my friend! You have done a great service to us, and to the Beornings. The fewer the goblins in the Floodfells, the better, no? Ha, now let us continue with the survey mission!\n\n'I have taken a glance inside Sundergrót and I am sure you can guess what it is I saw in there! Oh, that is correct, my friend: many more goblins lurking inside. Bah, too many for only the four of us. If we are crafty, we should be able to survey all of Sundergrót and thwart whatever plans those goblins have with the old dwarf-hold. Now let us continue on our mission.'
